caseStudy.title: Case study · DACH retailer
caseStudy.challenge: Disconnected ecommerce, ERP, and service systems caused 3–4 day delays in claims and custom orders.
caseStudy.solution: Primex embedded a pod of developers + integration engineers, rebuilt the middleware layer, and introduced AI agents for claims triage.
caseStudy.result: Order accuracy +18%, claims cycle reduced to 4 hours, and support costs down 32%.
